name: HaiYao Accelerator (Ai ChatGPT free proxy)
summary: Chinese VPN/proxy extension that forcibly disables competing proxy extensions and explicitly targets Tampermonkey by name. Injects remote tracking script from speed.ilink-tk.com on every page visit. Server-controlled extension whitelist allows operator to remotely control which user extensions get disabled.

vulnerabilities.title: Extension Enumeration and Forcible Disabling
vulnerabilities.description: Enumerates ALL installed extensions via chrome.management.getAll() and disables any with proxy permission. Explicitly targets Tampermonkey by name for disabling.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Script Injection on Every Page
vulnerabilities.description: Injects remote JavaScript from speed.ilink-tk.com on every non-LAN page visit. Server operator could serve arbitrary JS through this endpoint.

vulnerabilities.title: Server-Controlled Extension Whitelist
vulnerabilities.description: Server can dynamically update which extensions are allowed to remain enabled, giving operator remote control over which user extensions get killed.

flags.description: Uses chrome.management.getAll() to enumerate all extensions, disables competing proxy extensions and Tampermonkey
Server-controlled whitelist determines which user extensions survive; API servers can be dynamically updated
Sends user IP, full user agent, extension runtime ID, and connection metadata to backend servers on every API call
